subject: p13473781
History: Hypoxemia, spiking fevers, evaluation for intrathoracic process.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, severe cardiomegaly persists and the presence of a left pleural effusion cannot be excluded. In addition to these findings, todays image shows mild pulmonary edema. Left retrocardiac atelectasis. No pneumothorax.
